content:
Today I chose issue 15053 for discussion!

Add an instance {add_,}sub{monoid,group}_class S M → has_coe_t S ({add_,}sub{monoid,group} M)
Created by @Anne Baanen (@Vierkantor) on 2022-06-29
Labels:

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Probably useless/a much different problem now because of the way Lean 4 handles coercions?
I think this coercion will still be useful in Mathlib 4, but agreed that it will be a very different implementation.
